Name: SNOOP BLAST FREEZE
Texture: This slime features a sizzly icee texture with iridescent glitter scattered throughout the slime. As you play with the slime, it inflates and becomes fluffy and soft icee slime.

Included.Includedone: small jar of iridescent micro glitter

Name: RAW HONEYCOMB
Texture: This slime features a jelly-like base and honeycomb add-ons for you to mix together. Once it is mixed, it becomes a soft, fluffy slime.

Name: ICED DRAGON FRUIT TEA
Texture: This slime features a thick, clear base with squishy sponges and dragon fruit themed add-ins. You can squeeze and crush the sponges!

Included.Includedtwo: Faux dragon fruit sprinkles (inside the slime)

Name: MANGO JUICE
Texture: This slime features a semi-jiggly base and a realistic mango clay add-on for you to mix into the slime. Once it is mixed, it becomes a inflating butter

Included.Includedone: 1 clay mango add-on (topped off with two mini leaves + iridescent glitter)

Name: FROGGY POND
Texture: This slime features a crunchy bingsu slime base with a crunchy slushee topping slime for you to decorate the slime yourself. Once it is mixed, it becomes a crunchy and inflatable bingsu and slushee hybrid slime.

Included.Includedtwo: 1 fake lily pad charm (style may vary - may or may not include a flower)

Name: Peachy's Pumpkin Pie DIY Kit
Texture: A mix of crispy Snow Fizz slime and smooth Butter slime textures. When mixed together, they create a sizzly, crispy bingsu butter.

Name: Bb Seal Fur
Texture: A Cloud Slime. This texture is soft, super drizzly and holdable.

Name: Boba Bunny DIY Kit
Texture: Crispy white glue bingsu slime with 1oz of clear slime topper

Name: Honey Toast CLAY Kit
Texture: Thick and glossy slime base with a Honey Toast clay topper you can mix in yourself!

Name: Bear Bun CLAY Kit
Texture: Thick and glossy slime base with a 'bear bun' clay topper you can mix in yourself!

Name: Crispy Autumn Leaves
Texture: A crunchy Bingsu textured slime. If you want a slime with mild inflation, a drier feel and tons of crunches, then this is the slime for you!

Name: Matcha Bear Waffle CLAY Kit
Texture: Thick and glossy slime base with a 'Bear Waffle' clay topper you can mix in yourself!
